POLARIS

Guiding UCSD into a brighter future

We're a dedicated trio of students running for Associated Students with a vision to transform campus life, enhance resources, and build a stronger UCSD community.

Our Story

About Polaris

Named after the North Star that has guided travelers for centuries, Polaris is committed to guiding UCSD toward a brighter future.

Our Mission

At Polaris, we believe that effective student governance can transform the university experience. We're committed to making UCSD a place where every student has the resources, support, and opportunities they need to thrive academically, professionally, and personally.

Our campaign is built on the foundation of transparency, innovation, and inclusivity. We're dedicated to addressing the real issues that affect students daily - from academic resources and campus facilities to career development and community building.

✨Polaris for UCSD

Our Vision

We're guided by these core principles in everything we do:

🎓

Student-Centered Governance

We believe every decision should be made with students' best interests at heart.

⚖️

Transparency & Accountability

We're committed to open communication and responsible management of resources.

💡

Innovation & Progress

We're focused on finding new solutions to improve campus life and academic experience.

🌈

Inclusivity & Diversity

We champion the voices and needs of all students, from all backgrounds and disciplines.

Our Vision

Our Platform

We've crafted a comprehensive platform focused on improving campus life, fostering student spirit, and creating meaningful opportunities.

Campus Improvements

Enhancing campus facilities and accessibility

Open Geisel 24 Hours
We'll negotiate with the University to keep floors 1 & 2 open overnight with security instead of staff, subsidizing costs with AS funds if needed.
  • Negotiate with the University
  • Open floors 1 & 2 Overnight
  • No staff, only security
  • Subsidize with AS if needed
Better Parking Contracts
Renegotiate MTS garage contracts to double parking span and implement smart tracking technology.
  • MTS Garage Renegotiation
  • Double parking span
  • Parking Info System
  • Smart Parking Tracking
Parking Taskforce
Create a dedicated team to evaluate existing infrastructure and implement technology solutions.
  • Eval. existing Infrastructure
  • Advocate for better policy
  • Implement tech solutions
  • Long-term strategies

Together, We're Polaris
